title: Room Available for Rent _San Leandro near Hayward
posting_body: 1 bedroom available to rent in a 2-bedroom apartment.
The bedroom is private and empty (unfurnished).
There is shared access to the rest of the apartment (bathroom is shared).
The rent price includes all utilities like water, garbage, electricity, gas, and internet.
A reserved parking space is also included in a gated parking lot.
Rent is $1,100 per month and there is a $1,000 deposit required.
The apartment is close to major freeways (880, 238, 580) and easy access to BART.
The location is a good commute to Cal State East Bay and central to getting around the Bay Area.
The apartment building also has laundry machines and a gated parking lot.
I am subleasing the second bedroom.
I am a laid back professional guy that works often.
I am looking for a good housemate that is clean, respectful, and courteous to their housemate.
And also pays rent on time.
The first 3 photos are of the bedroom.
Please reply with your information if interested.
